ComicInfo.Summary:
The story with 4 million readers and 40 thousand monthly subscribers on Tapas continues! As Allie attempts to relax after the craziest day of their life, they're immediately thrusted into an impromptu party. Only this one isn't the kind with candy and pi√±atas. As this evolves, so does Allie and Chris's relationship to a level Allie never expected.
